name: hwUSD
description: hwUSD is a multi-chain stable coin vault that deploys stable coins into deFi to offer the best risk-adjusted returns on stables. hwUSD vault is built on the [boring-vault](https://github.com/Se7en-Seas/boring-vault) standard on 3 chains- HyperEVM, Base & Ethereum Mainnet accepting: USDE, USDT0 & USDC which is natively cross-chain, runs on a secure architecture with top in-house curation, risk management and top infrastructure partners
